Title: LyncSilverlightDemo
Description: LyncSilverlightDemo solution is a demo project for "Microsoft Lync 2013 SDK Development Manual".
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project shows how to use the Microsoft Lync 2013 SDK and Silverlight to create a Lync Control, and how to deploy applications that use the Lync Control.

Requirements
1) Microsoft Lync 2013 must be installed and running on the development computer.
2) The Lync client must be signed in to the computer where the Lync application is running.
3) Microsoft Lync 2013 SDK must be installed on the development computer.
